sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Rainwood is a large forest that lies on Cape Wrath in the Stormlands. Although it is rainy, the region is fertile enough. [[Mistwood]] is located in the southern rainwood, while [[Rain House]] is found in its northeast.
